tool_description: Tracks inventory levels of collection supplies, containers, and reagents, providing alerts for low stock and reorder recommendations.

item_categories.description: Specific categories to check: tubes, needles, labels, reagents, all

include_expired.description: Whether to include expired items in the count

error_messages: Invalid location: Specified location is not found in inventory system.
Invalid category: Use one of [tubes, needles, labels, reagents, all].
Inventory system unavailable: Cannot access inventory database at this time.
usage: Check inventory status by providing location and optionally specifying item_categories and include_expired. The tool returns current stock levels and alerts.

inventory_summary.description: Summary of inventory levels by category

low_stock_alerts.description: Items that are below minimum stock levels
